findings.title: ERC1155TokenReceiverMock.sol and ERC721ReceiverMock.sol: Anyone can trigger token Receive events
findings.description: Anyone can call functions onERC1155Received(), onERC1155BatchReceived() and onERC721Received() and trigger token received events without actually transferring the tokens.

findings.title: Multiple contracts: Minting is allowed while the contract is paused
findings.description: The contracts REVVMotorsportInventory.sol, TokenLaunchpadVouchers.sol, ERC1155InventoryPausableMock.sol, ERC1155721InventoryPausableMock.sol and ERC721PausableMock.sol allows minting tokens while the contract is in paused state.

findings.title: Allows setting the approval bit without an actual approval
findings.description: The function `approve()` allows setting approval for a zero address, resulting in setting the approval bit without changing the value in the approval mapping.
